00009    * Remove duplicated phases by default.

00012   ParamicsScenarioReader::ParamicsScenarioReader(string instance_path_p)

00018   /*
00019    * Reads the scenario definitions files and returns the scenario
00020    */
00021   Scenario* ParamicsScenarioReader::readScenario(){
00022     Scenario* sc = new Scenario();
00023     readIntersections(sc);
00024     readLinks(sc);
00025     readDetectors(sc);
00026     readPhasesAndSignalGroups(sc);
00027     if(del_dup_phases)
00028       removeDuplicatedPhases(sc);
00029     return sc;
00030   }

00032   /*
00033    * Reads the intersection definitions file and places into the scenario object.
00034    * @param scenario object where intersections data will be placed
00035    */  
00036   void ParamicsScenarioReader::readIntersections(Scenario* sc){
00037 
00038     // File with signaled intersections
00039     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/SCATS-groups").c_str());
00040     string line;
00041     // Reading all signaled intersections
00042     while(getline(fin,line)){
00043       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00044       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00045 
00046       if(vec_tokens.size() == 0) continue;
00047 
00048       // Getting the intersection data
00049       string line_type = vec_tokens[0];      
00050 
00051       if(line_type == "intersection"){
00052 
00053         int scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00054         // Adding it to the scenario
00055         sc->addIntersection(new Intersection(vec_tokens[1], scatsId, 0, 0));
00056       }
00057     }
00058 
00059     // I dont care about Non-signaled intersections
00060 
00061   }
00062 
00066   void ParamicsScenarioReader::readLinks(Scenario* sc){
00067     
00068     // File with the links between intersections
00069     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/links").c_str());
00070     string line;
00071     // Reading all Links
00072     while(getline(fin,line)){
00073       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00074       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00075       if(vec_tokens.size() == 0) continue;
00076       // Getting Link Data
00077       string id = vec_tokens[1] + ":" + vec_tokens[2];
00078       Intersection* from = sc->getIntersection(vec_tokens[1]);
00079       Intersection* to = sc->getIntersection(vec_tokens[2]);
00080       // If it's going to a zone, there is no need for the link... no detectors, no signals 
00081       if(to == NULL) continue; 
00082 
00083       int numLanes = vec_tokens[3] == "category" ? atoi(vec_tokens[4].c_str()) : 1;
00084       // Adding the Link
00085       sc->addLink(new Link(id,from,to,numLanes));
00086       }
00087   }

00092   void ParamicsScenarioReader::readDetectors(Scenario* sc){
00093     
00094     // File with detectors description
00095     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/detectors").c_str());
00096     string line;
00097     // Reading all signaled intersections
00098     while(getline(fin,line)){
00099       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00100       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line," \"");
00101       if(vec_tokens.size() == 0) continue;
00102       // Getting detector data      
00103       Link* link = sc->getLink(vec_tokens[7]);
00104       if(link == NULL){
00105         cout << "ERROR reading detectors: Link " << vec_tokens[7] << " not found" << endl;
00106         exit(-1);
00107       }
00108 
00109       // Parsing the loop detector name to get information about
00110       vector <string> vec_tokens_det = getTokenizedLine( vec_tokens[1], "_" );
00111       int scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens_det[1].c_str());
00112 
00113       int lane = atoi(vec_tokens[9].c_str());
00114       // Adding the detector to the link
00115       link->addDetector(new Detector(scatsId,lane));      
00116     }
00117 
00118   }

00123   void ParamicsScenarioReader::readPhasesAndSignalGroups(Scenario* sc){
00124 
00125     // File with the signal phases
00126     ifstream fin((instance_path + "/SCATS-groups").c_str());
00127 
00128     // Tokenizing the first line to verify if it's the correct file
00129     string line;
00130     Intersection* it = NULL;
00131     // Reading all Signal Phases
00132     while(getline(fin,line)){
00133       // Need to be tokenized! (Some empty separated by tabs inputs have meaning)
00134       vector <string> vec_tokens = getTokenizedLine(line);
00135       
00136       if(vec_tokens.size() == 0) continue;
00137 
00138       string line_type = vec_tokens[0];
00139       if(line_type == "intersection"){
00140         int intersection_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00141         it = sc->getIntersection(intersection_scatsId);
00142         if(it == NULL){
00143           cout << "ERROR reading Phases and Signal Groups: Intersection " << vec_tokens[1] << " not found" << endl;
00144           exit(-1);
00145         }
00146       }
00147 
00148       // Adding signal groups to the links
00149       if(line_type == "group" && vec_tokens.size() >= 3 && vec_tokens[2] == "turn" ){
00150 
00151         int signal_group_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00152         vector <string> vec_tokens_link = getTokenizedLine(vec_tokens[3],":");
00153         if(vec_tokens_link.size() < 2){
00154           cout << "ERROR reading detectors: Link name not found ib " << ( vec_tokens[1] ) << " not found" << endl;
00155           exit(-1);
00156         }
00157         Link* l = sc->getLink(vec_tokens_link[0] + ":" + vec_tokens_link[1] );
00158         if(l == NULL ){
00159           cout << "ERROR reading detectors: Link " << ( vec_tokens_link[0] + ":" + vec_tokens_link[1] ) << " not found" << endl;
00160           exit(-1);
00161         }
00162         SignalGroup* sg = NULL;
00163         // There could be more than one link with the same signal group...
00164         // Then one must search for the signal group, if can't find, add new.
00165         for(LinkSet::iterator li=it->in_links.begin(); li != it->in_links.end() && sg == NULL; li++){
00166           sg = (*li)->getSignalGroup(signal_group_scatsId);       
00167         }               
00168         if(sg == NULL) sg = new SignalGroup(signal_group_scatsId);
00169         //Adding the signal group to the link
00170         l->addSignalGroup(sg);
00171       }
00172 
00173       // Adding phases to the current intersection
00174       if(line_type == "phase"){
00175         // Getting phase data
00176         Phase *p = new Phase( vec_tokens[1]);
00177         it->addPhase(p);    
00178         for(unsigned int i=3; i < vec_tokens.size(); i++){
00179           int signal_group_scatsId = atoi(vec_tokens[i].c_str());
00180           // Search for the signal group in one of the in links
00181           for(LinkSet::iterator li=it->in_links.begin(); li != it->in_links.end(); li++){
00182             SignalGroup* sg = (*li)->getSignalGroup(signal_group_scatsId);
00183             if(sg!=NULL){
00184               p->addSignalGroup(sg);
00185               assignPhasesDetectors(p,(*li)->detectors);
00186               break;
00187             }
00188           }      
00189         }
00190       }
00191     }   
00192   }

00197   void ParamicsScenarioReader::removeDuplicatedPhases(Scenario* sc){
00198     
00199     // In every intersection
00200     for(IntersectionSet::iterator ii = sc->intersections.begin(); ii != sc->intersections.end(); ii++)
00201       // For every two phases
00202       for(PhaseSet::iterator pi1 = (*ii)->phases.begin(); pi1 != (*ii)->phases.end(); pi1++)
00203         for(PhaseSet::iterator pi2 = pi1; pi2 != (*ii)->phases.end(); pi2++){
00204           // If not the same phase and signal groups have same size
00205           if(pi1 != pi2 && (*pi1)->signal_groups.size() == (*pi2)->signal_groups.size() ){
00206             // Check if for each phase pair, all signal groups are equal
00207             bool all_equal = true;
00208             for(SignalGroupSet::iterator sgi1 = (*pi1)->signal_groups.begin(); sgi1 != (*pi1)->signal_groups.end() && all_equal; sgi1++){
00209               bool one_equal = false;
00210               for(SignalGroupSet::iterator sgi2 = (*pi2)->signal_groups.begin(); sgi2 != (*pi2)->signal_groups.end() && !one_equal; sgi2++)
00211                 one_equal = ((*sgi1)->getScatsId() == (*sgi2)->getScatsId());
00212               all_equal &= one_equal;
00213             }
00214             // If every signal group is equal, remove it!
00215             if(all_equal){
00216               (*ii)->phases.erase(pi2);
00217               pi2--;
00218             }
00219           }             
00220         }
00221   }

00227   vector<string> ParamicsScenarioReader::getTokenizedLine(string line){
00228     return getTokenizedLine(line," ");
00229   }
00230 
00235   vector<string> ParamicsScenarioReader::getTokenizedLine(string line, const char* sep_chars){
00236     // Setting up tokenizer
00237     typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> >  tokenizer;
00238     boost::char_separator<char> sep(sep_chars);
00239 
00240 
00241     tokenizer tokens(line, sep);
00242     vector <string> vec_tokens;
00243     for (tokenizer::iterator tok_iter = tokens.begin(); tok_iter != tokens.end(); ++tok_iter) vec_tokens.push_back(*tok_iter);
00244 
00245     return vec_tokens;
00246   }

00252   void ParamicsScenarioReader::assignPhasesDetectors(Phase* p, DetectorSet detectors){
00253     for(DetectorSet::iterator di=detectors.begin(); di!= detectors.end(); di++)
00254       p->addDetector(*di);
00255   }
00256 
00257 }
